name: AREA 51: THE INTRUDER
description:
Team Name

JannerBros (a solo developer)

Gameplay Instructions

W A S D or Arrow keys -  to move
Mouse  -  look around
Shift - sprint 
Tab - Access Inventory
2 - Glow Stick
3 - Flash Light
4 - Lighter
5 - Torch
6 - Night Vision (Z to Zoom In & Out)

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission.

Few Construction Site VOL. 1 by Dekogon Studios (For environment), Few Industry Props Pack 6 (For environment), Skinny (Alien)

Other: Quixel Megascans: Surface (Old Brick and Quarry Ground modified), Deals (Blood)
